page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENTS & EVENTS
page.content: The 3 villages are within 40 miles of Bournemouth,Poole,Salisbury.Here all forms of performing arts take place: theatre,ballet,opera,exhibitions, orchestral concerts & cinemas.Warmwell hold an annual fete for church upkeep, Broadmayne;a carnival,a procession of floats,numerous stalls & static displays.Majorettes;marching to music, twirling batons;compete & entertain. Dog obedience tests,children performing trad.country dances & tug -of-war contests are all part of the carnival scene.Regular events are held to raise funds for the church,chapel, playgroup,school,village hall,Dorset Hospice & other causes.These vary from coffee mornings,jumble sales,barn dances & whist drives to pantomines, discos & concerts.
